articles.title: Tesla Stock Drops as U.S. Auto Regulator Probes Alleged Model 3 Door Defects
articles.mainIdea: Tesla Stock Drops as U.S. Auto Regulator Probes Alleged Model 3 Door Defects
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Tesla Stock Drops as U.S. Auto Regulator Probes Alleged Model 3 Door Defects. The U.S. auto safety regulator has opened an investigation into the mechanical door release on the 2022 Tesla Model 3. The probe, launched Tuesday by the Office of Defects Investigation at the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, or NHTSA, covers an estimated 179,071 vehicles. Tesla didn’t immediately respond to Barron’s request for comment. Related tickers mentioned: F, HNDAF, TSLA.

articles.summary: TheStreet: Wealthy buyers expose distressing auto industry trend. articles.title: Generative Renaissance Comes Alive: SIGGRAPH Asia 2025 Closes in Hong Kong
articles.mainIdea: Generative Renaissance Comes Alive: SIGGRAPH Asia 2025 Closes in Hong Kong
articles.summary: PR Newswire: Generative Renaissance Comes Alive: SIGGRAPH Asia 2025 Closes in Hong Kong. SIGGRAPH Asia 2025, themed "Generative Renaissance," has successfully come to a close at the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre. Over 6,000 attendees from 60 countries gathered to explore the latest innovations in computer graphics and interactive techniques. Related tickers mentioned: ADBE, TCEHY.
